Package com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath.soft

Interface SoftOathSettings

public interface SoftOathSettings
SoftOathSettings interface.
Since:
4.0

  • Method Details

    • setHotpLength

      void setHotpLength(int otpLength)
      Set the HOTP length.
      Parameters:
      otpLength - the OTP length. Allowed range is 6-10 digits.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when otpLength is not in allowed range.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setHotpHashAlgorithm

      void setHotpHashAlgorithm(SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
      Set the HOTP hash algorithm. HOTP only support SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm.SHA1 and SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm.SHA256 hash algorithm.
      Parameters:
      hashAlgorithm - the hmac algorithm.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setTotpLength

      void setTotpLength(int otpLength)
      Set the TOTP length.
      Parameters:
      otpLength - the OTP length. Allowed range is 6-10 digits.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when otpLength is not in allowed range.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setTotpHashAlgorithm

      void setTotpHashAlgorithm(SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
      Set the TOTP hash algorithm.
      Parameters:
      hashAlgorithm - the hmac algorithm.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setTotpStartTime

      void setTotpStartTime(long startTime)
      Set the T0 value for TOTP computation.
      Parameters:
      startTime - value to start counting time steps. Default value is 0.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when startTime is negative.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setTotpTimestepSize

      void setTotpTimestepSize(int timestepSize)
      Set the TOTP time step size.
      Parameters:
      timestepSize - the time step size. Default value is 30
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when timestepSize is less than or equal to 0.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setTotpTimestepType

      void setTotpTimestepType(SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType timestepType)
      Set the TOTP time step type.
      Parameters:
      timestepType - the time step type. Default value is Seconds
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when timestepSize is less than or equal to 0.
      Since:
      4.1

    • setOcraOtpLength

      void setOcraOtpLength(int otpLength)
      Set the OCRA OTP length.
      Parameters:
      otpLength - the OTP length. 0 for full length or any value in the range 4-10 digits.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when otpLength is not in allowed range.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraHashAlgorithm

      void setOcraHashAlgorithm(SoftOathSettings.OathHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
      Set the OCRA hash algorithm.
      Parameters:
      hashAlgorithm - the hmac algorithm.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraTimeSettings

      void setOcraTimeSettings(SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType timestepType, int timestepSize, long startTime)
      Set the OCRA time settings.
      Parameters:
      timestepType - the time step type, set to OathTimestepType.NONE to not use it
      timestepSize - the time step size, it is ignored if timestepType is NONE
      startTime - the start time, it is ignored if timestepType is NONE
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when at least one of these condition is true:
      • timestepType is not equal to SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType.NONE and timestepSize is less than or equal to zero.
      • timestepType is not equal to SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType.NONE and startTime is less than zero.
      • timestepType is equal to SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType.SECONDS and timestepSize is greater than 59.
      • timestepType is equal to SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType.MINUTES and timestepSize is greater than 59.
      • timestepType is equal to SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType.HOURS and timestepSize is greater than 48.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraStartTime

      void setOcraStartTime(long startTime)
      Set the OCRA time settings specific for startTime.
      Parameters:
      startTime - the start time, it is ignored if timestepType is NONE
      Since:
      6.0

    • setOcraCounterUsed

      void setOcraCounterUsed(boolean useCounter)
      Enable/Disable the counter (C) in OCRA computation.
      Parameters:
      useCounter - True to enable.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraChallengeQuestionFormat

      void setOcraChallengeQuestionFormat(SoftOathSettings.OcraChallengeQuestionFormat challengeQuestionFormat)
      Set the format of the challenge question (Q)
      Parameters:
      challengeQuestionFormat - the format of the Challenge question
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraSessionLength

      void setOcraSessionLength(int sessionLength)
      Set the maximum length in bytes of the Session (S) in UTF-8 encoding.
      Parameters:
      sessionLength - the length of the Session. -1 to not use session in Ocra computation or any value in the range 1-512. Default value is -1 (not used)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when at least one of these condition is true:
      • sessionLength is less than -1.
      • sessionLength is positive but not in allowed range.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraPasswordHashAlgorithm

      void setOcraPasswordHashAlgorithm(SoftOathSettings.OcraPasswordHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm)
      Set the password Hash algorithm, set to OcraPasswordHashAlgorithm.NONE to not use it
      Parameters:
      hashAlgorithm - the Password Hash algorithm
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraMaximumChallengeQuestionLength

      void setOcraMaximumChallengeQuestionLength(int maxChallengeQuestionLength)
      Set the maximum challenge question length.
      Parameters:
      maxChallengeQuestionLength - the maximum length of the challenge string regardless of the format (e.g. the number of nibbles in hexadecimal format or the maximum number of digits in numerical format). Any value in the range 4-64.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when maxChallengeQuestionLength is not in the allowed range.
      Since:
      4.0

    • setOcraSuite

      void setOcraSuite(SecureString ocrasuite)
      Set the Ocra Suite, all the relevant OCRA settings will be set accordingly. Notice the startTime cannot be configured by Ocra Suite. Call setOcraTimeSettings(com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath.soft.SoftOathSettings.OathTimestepType, int, long) if startTime needs to be tweaked.
      Parameters:
      ocrasuite - the Ocra Suite
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the ocrasuite is invalid.
      Since:
      4.0
